word: Following an Organized Plan. [NOTE.--THE NECESSITY AND ADVANTAGES OF THOROUGH ORGANIZATION ARE HERE SET FORTH IN SEVERAL STATEMENTS SOME OF WHICH WERE DIRECTED TO INSTITUTIONAL MANAGERS. THESE PRINCIPLES, HOWEVER, APPLYING TO ALL LINES OF WORK, JUSTIFY THEIR INCLUSION HERE. --COMPILERS.]--It is essential to labor with order, following an organized plan and a definite object. No one can properly instruct another unless he sees to it that the work to be done shall be taken hold of systematically and in order, so that it may be done at the proper time. . . .
